sqlMap.statement: SELECT IF.TRANSACTION_ID ,IF.SEGMENT_ID ,IF.UNIT_ID ,IF.SEQ_NUMBER ,IF.CSMP_CSA_NUM ,IF.CSMP_CSA_USR_NM ,IF.CSMP_CUSA_USR_NUM ,IF.CSMP_RCV_CONTR_NUM ,IF.CSMP_CONTR_STS_TXT ,IF.CSMP_RG_CD ,IF.CSMP_DLR_TXT ,IF.CSMP_EFF_FROM_DT ,IF.CSMP_EFF_THRU_DT ,IF.CSMP_CATG_CD ,IF.CSMP_CR_LIST_TXT ,IF.CSMP_CR_LIST_GEN_NUM ,IF.CSMP_VLD_FROM_DT ,IF.CSMP_PREV_RCV_CONTR_NUM ,IF.CSMP_PREV_CUSA_USR_NUM ,IF.CSMP_TRX_TXT ,IF.CSMP_LAST_UPD_TS FROM NMAI7240_01 IF WHERE IF.INTERFACE_ID = #interfaceId# AND IF.TRANSACTION_ID = #transactionId# AND IF.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY SEGMENT_ID ,UNIT_ID ,SEQ_NUMBER
